properties.description: These elements will be hidden and have hardcoded values based on the form.
properties.title: FOR REVIEW ONLY

properties.description: Abstract or summary of the item.
properties.title: Abstract
First Name, Middle Name or Initial

index.key: Author in quotations or text abstracts

options.index: Author in quotations or text abstracts

index.key: Author in quotations or text abstracts

options.index: Author in quotations or text abstracts

properties.title: LC Subject Headings (LCSH)
properties.description: Use full double-dash format with spaces, e.g. Open spaces -- Ontario -- Toronto

properties.title: Publication Date
properties.description: Date of publication (if published) or last revised date.
Applies only to published works where the publisher has placed an embargo. Maximum 24 months from date of publication.
properties.title: Embargo Date

properties.description: Copyright information related to the publication; could be related to who owns the copyright to the abstract, etc.

index.key: Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International Public License; https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

properties.title: Copyright Information

properties.description: If this work has been published, please provide as much information as possible (e.g., journal title, pages).
properties.title: Citation
International Standard Book Number (ISBN)
properties.description: Include hyphens in 10- or 13-digit number; e.g. 978-0-662-48548-3

properties.title: Digital Object Identifier (DOI)
properties.description: Begin with prefix number; e.g. 10.6084/m9.figshare.3142000; do not include http://dx.doi.org

properties.title: Uniform Resource Identifier (URI)
properties.description: e.g. http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/22722519; if the item has a DOI but not a URI, use the DOI prefixed by http://dx.doi.org/, e.g. http://dx.doi.org/10.1002/poi3.91

properties.title: Note
properties.description: Any additional information about the item that may be relevant.
